trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs)"></xref> methods.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs> class also provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> methods.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> and using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to paint the specified bounds with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.

Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem"></xref>.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs.ConnectedArea%2A> property returns an empty <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be painted.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be painted.
